A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

What actually happened.

## Screenshots (if applicable)

Add screenshots to help explain the problem.

## Environment

- **OS:** (e.g., iOS 17, Android 14, macOS)
